| HistoryText             = The Black Ice Berserkers were a group of dwarf [[Frost Giants]] manipulated by [[Loki Laufeyson (Ikol) (Earth-616)|Loki]] into attacking a S.H.I.E.L.D. storage facility to retrieve a crate containing the [[Space Stone|Space Gem]]. Most were stopped by [[Samuel Wilson (Earth-616)|Captain America]], [[Jane Foster (Earth-616)|Thor]] and [[Riri Williams (Earth-616)|Ironheart]], who had been previously summoned by S.H.I.E.L.D. as back-up, and were subsequently arrested. [[Snarr (Earth-616)|Snarr]] slipped away from the fight with the crate, but was stopped and killed by [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Logan]] in the outer perimeter of the building before he could reunite with Loki.{{r|Marvel Legacy Vol 1 1}}
